org.bitcoin.x6763.crypto.ecdsa
Class KeyPair

java.lang.Object
  org.bitcoin.x6763.crypto.ecdsa.KeyPair

public class KeyPair
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a simple holder for a key pair (a public key and a private key). it does not enforce any security, and, when initialized, should be treated like a private key.

Author:
x6763

Constructor Summary
KeyPair(PublicKey publicKey, PrivateKey privateKey)
          Constructs a key pair from the given public key and private key

 PrivateKey getPrivate()
          Returns the private key component of this key pair
 PublicKey getPublic()
